inclusion.criterion: non-traumatic low back pain for one week or less
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: allergy or intolerance to study medication
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: suspected active oncologic, urologic, or gynecologic disease
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. He has no positive history of drug allergy.
